data.title: Richard R. Thomas
data.meta_description: RICHARD "REX" THOMAS is an Associate Professor at St. John’s University. He designed, and is currently, the Director of the Bachelor’s of Science program in Photojournalism and Digital Media Design, as well as created the minor in Dramatic Arts. From 2013 - 2016, he was Chair of the Division of Mass Communication. Thomas is also a narrative artist, working extensively in the performing, visual and literary arts.
